summary: Donation section (`frontend/src/components/RewardsSection.tsx`) was substantially rewritten to include a “Support Whispers Of The White Moon” intro with emojis, a Cash App block showing “Donate Via Cash App”, “Send support to:”, and “$WOTWM”, and a “Rewards” heading followed by a tier list rendered from `animeSiteConfig.rewards.tiers`. However, the section still renders a `SectionHeader` titled “Donation”, which may conflict with the requirement to replace *all* existing content with the provided copy.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace all existing content in the Donation section with the provided Donation copy for “Support Whispers Of The White Moon”, including the intro text, the Cash App donation block with handle “$WOTWM”, and the “Rewards” heading.
missing_requirements.reason: The updated section still includes a `SectionHeader` with title "Donation", which appears to be leftover/extra content rather than the specified “Support Whispers Of The White Moon” donation copy. This may prevent the Donation section from matching the provided copy exactly and violates “replace all existing content”.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added tracking metadata for feature requests in `project_state.json` (new_feature_requests AR-1/AR-2/AR-3 marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; appears to be project bookkeeping rather than implementation of the Donation section UI requirements.
Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; appears to be documentation/metadata output rather than the specified Donation section changes.
